author: gdr36
title: Weird Looking Creature, Great Parts Pack
review:
Overview: Glurt was released in 2014 for 5 dollars in the U.S. I received it about 5 years ago and built it, but eventually took it apart and used the pieces in my own creations.  

Glurt is a very weird-looking thing. He/she is very small, has pop-out eyes, a viny tail, and snake hands/guns(I have no idea what they're supposed to be), and black ears. The build is straightforward.

Parts: There are some really cool parts in here for 5 dollars. The lime green arches over the eyes, the viny tail, the snake hands, and the teeth are all really cool pieces. 

Glurt may be weird, but it is also is kind of cute in my opinion. However, it is probably more useful as a parts pack with all the cool pieces. You can buy it for 8 dollars now. By no means is Glurt a must-buy, but if you really like the look of it or you want the parts for a custom creation, I would definitely go for it and buy the set.
